text: Kazimierz Wielki is a 1975 Polish historical drama movie directed by Ewa Petelska and Czesław Petelski. It stars Włodzimierz Bednarski, Krzysztof Chamiec, Zofia Saretok, Ignacy Machowski, Wiesław Gołas, Władysław Hańcza, Bolesław Płotnicki. ==Other websites== * Category:1975 drama movies Category:1970s historical movies Category:Polish drama movies Category:Movies directed by Czesław Petelski Category:Movies directed by Ewa Petelska
title: Kazimierz Wielki
